sections.title: Lightning-fast page loads, everywhere
sections.content:
No matter where your customers are shopping, our newly expanded global infrastructure ensures they get an incredibly fast experience by efficiently routing traffic and rendering sites as close to their locations as possible.

With 270 points of presence around the world and additional locations being continually deployed, businesses are seeing their sites respond twice as fast.

sections.title: One-page checkout
sections.content:
The checkout you know and trust is getting a major overhaul. This year, we’re rolling out an all-new, one-page checkout. Inspired by Shop Pay’s proven conversion, it’s faster, higher-converting, and exactly what your customers expect.
Fewer fields to enter make it faster for customers to complete their purchase.
Fewer page loads mean less friction for customers, which leads to higher conversion.

sections.title: Drag-and-drop checkout editor
sections.content:
Easily edit the look of your checkout with the new checkout editor, which seamlessly integrates with Shop Pay for a consistent brand and buyer experience. Exclusive to Shopify Plus.
Add your brand’s logo, change the background color or image, and update the font of your checkout.
Install checkout apps that integrate with the editor to add more functionality to your checkout experience.

sections.title: Apps to extend checkout
sections.content: Customize your checkout to include things like additional fields, product offers, and loyalty programs by installing apps built for checkout.

sections.title: Cart and checkout validations
sections.content: Create rules that implement custom, dynamic restrictions for whether a product can be purchased, and in what quantities, with validations built on Shopify Functions.

sections.title: Build trust with Shop Promise
sections.content:
Communicate reliable, fast delivery by installing the Shop channel and adding the Shop Promise badge and delivery dates to your store.
Display smart delivery dates predicted by Shopify that are backed by a limited guarantee for your customers if they’re missed.
Help customers check out with confidence and increase conversion by up to 25%.

sections.title: Signed-in shopping with Shop
sections.content: Identify and sign in high-intent Shop users before they reach checkout with their Shop credentials, including saved passkeys. Let customers speed safely through a one-click checkout using Shop Pay, lowering bounce rates and increasing conversion.

sections.title: Optimized image rendering and focal points
sections.content: We optimize your images for the highest quality and lowest file size to improve your store’s speed and increase conversion rates. Now you can choose the focal point on images, so your products show up front and center.

sections.title: Header and footer customizations
sections.content: With support for sections and blocks in the header and footer of themes, now you can customize any section of your store without leaving the editor or touching code.

sections.title: Extend your theme with custom CSS
sections.content: Easily add custom CSS to your online store theme without editing any theme files. Preview CSS changes directly in the editor.

sections.title: New color settings for online stores
sections.content: Now developers can help you better understand, access, and edit global color schemes for online stores with easy-to-add color settings for themes.

sections.title: AI-generated storefront content
sections.content:
Use Shopify Magic to beat writer’s block and automatically create product descriptions.
Input keywords or features and our system generates a description.
Produce compelling, tone-specific descriptions that convert.

sections.title: Better built-in search and recommendations
sections.content:
Improved search relevance ensures popular products are highlighted, and misspellings still return the right result to better match the customer’s intent.
Typeahead search suggestions help buyers find what they’re looking for faster.
Powered by data across Shopify, now product recommendations offer suggestions without any historical purchase data required.

sections.title: Customize your store with metaobjects
sections.content: Create reusable, custom content like a shoppable gallery, product highlights, cart upsells, and more with metaobjects. Draft, edit, translate, and reference your metaobjects directly within the online store editor, or use the Storefront API to seamlessly pull content into your custom storefront.

sections.title: Power dynamic content with metafields
sections.content: Now you can build dynamic collections with metafields. Further customize your metafields across commerce objects with updates that support rich text, money, and collection reference data.

sections.title: Enhanced Search & Discovery app
sections.content: Extend filters to product tags and large collections, recommend products that are frequently bought together, and optimize how customers navigate your store with enhanced analytics. Now using metafields, you can add manual recommendations and product boosts at scale.
relatedLinks: [Try the Search and Discovery app in your store](https://admin.shopify.com/apps/search-and-discovery?utm_source=editions&utm_feature=search-and-discovery-app)

sections.title: Sanity integration
sections.content: If you use Sanity, now you can connect your content directly to your Shopify Online Store for easier development and better store performance.

sections.title: Product bundles
sections.content: Coming soon, you can set up bundles with the new Shopify Bundles app or any of the upcoming bundles apps built on Shopify Functions in the Shopify App Store.

sections.title: New discount apps built on Shopify Functions
sections.content: Now you can offer customers more discount types and the ability to combine multiple discounts on a single order. Choose from our four ready-to-use discounts or access additional types, like a free gift with purchase, using a discount app that integrates seamlessly with your admin. You can also build a custom app with Shopify Functions.

sections.title: Create channel-specific discounts
sections.content: Offer unique discounts across channels like Google, Facebook, and Instagram to strengthen customer relationships and sell more.

sections.title: Updates to our Subscription APIs
sections.content: Now developers can make temporary changes to subscription contracts without overwriting source data, reduce API calls when creating, billing, or updating contracts, and support local delivery and in-store pickup for subscription orders.

sections.title: Deferred purchase options with PayPal
sections.content: Pre-orders and try-before-you-buy now support PayPal, so you can reach more customers around the world.

sections.title: Shopify Payments available in France
sections.content: Now businesses in France can accept credit cards and other popular payment methods using Shopify Payments.

sections.title: POS Go: all-in-one mobile selling hardware
sections.content: In-person sellers can stay on top of business with our latest mobile point of sale (POS) device. There’s no separate tablet or card reader needed with POS Go, so you can stay connected to your business at a fraction of the cost of other setups. Only available in the United States.

sections.title: Track incoming and committed inventory
sections.content: New inventory statuses like on hand and unavailable give you an actionable view of your total available inventory in your POS. Make better in-store decisions with insight into inventory that’s temporarily set aside for draft orders.

sections.title: Streamlined in-person checkout
sections.content: Customize your smart grid and save common line fees like rush orders for faster checkouts. Give customers tipping and receipt options with the improved Customer View app.

sections.title: Gift cards now integrate with POS
sections.content: Assign and edit gift cards through a customer’s profile, issue a physical or a digital gift card from POS.

sections.title: Shopify POS available in more markets
sections.content: Access Shopify POS in any of our 15 markets, now including Singapore and Finland.

sections.title: Staff permissions and sales attribution
sections.content: Retailers of all sizes can access detailed information on operational tasks with improved sales attribution and granular staff permissions.

sections.title: Support for 1,000+ locations
sections.content: Sell in person, at scale, and in more locations than ever with centralized support for more than 1,000 retail locations from a single store.

sections.title: More Shop app customization
sections.content:
Customize your product collections, descriptions, best sellers, and branding on your Shop Store.
Customers will be able to sign in to Shop easier than ever with passkeys.
Add new experiences to your Shop Store and product pages. Use partner apps Foursixty and Supergreat to host shoppable brand content and video reviews.
Use product reviews to discover new ways to grow from your customer feedback.

sections.title: Sync and sell on YouTube
sections.content:
Sell your products on YouTube to create authentic, live and on-demand shopping experiences.
Stand out with up-to-date product info right below your video, pinned in the chat, or tagged during a live stream.

sections.title: Translate & Adapt app
sections.content:
Engage more customers with regional, seasonal, and cultural relevance by localizing your store content across markets.

Use a side-by-side editor to add, edit, and review translated content, and automatically translate up to two languages completely free.
Adapt content to reflect spelling and messaging variations between markets.

sections.title: Tailor your product offering by market
sections.content: Control which products you publish in each market. Easily align with licensing agreements, regional regulations, and buyer expectations in different markets.

sections.title: Market-specific order routing and fulfillment
sections.content: Configure order routing rules to match your business needs, including routing based on the customer’s proximity and inventory availability.

sections.title: Introducing Markets Pro
sections.content:
Grow your business globally with Markets Pro, a complete solution that offers end-to-end liability management, cost-effective cross-border shipping and fulfillment, and localization tools.

Offload international tax filing, registration, and remittance.
Automatically remove items with import restrictions in each market to ensure your product catalog is compliant and buyers only see what they’re allowed to purchase in their region.
Access fraud protection on every cross-border order and protect refunds from currency fluctuations with guaranteed foreign exchange.

sections.title: Affordable shipping rates and integrated partners
sections.content: Get discounted rates on the Markets Pro carrier account and recommendations for new customer rates. Let us manage your international fulfillment or work with our certified logistics partners to fulfill and deliver orders.

sections.title: Prepaid duties and customs documentation
sections.content: Collect duties up front to get rid of surprise fees at delivery with Delivery Duty Paid labels and customs documentation that are easy to manage from your admin.

sections.title: Automatically localize experiences
sections.content: While Markets’ standard features let you manually localize your store, Markets Pro automates localization. Geolocation and domain redirect automatically ensure customers shop in their local experience, using the local currency and preferred payment methods.

sections.title: Quality rules
sections.content:
Create quantity rules for products and variants, including minimums and maximums, case-packs, and increments.
Increase average order value by adding minimum order quantities for products.
Simplify the fulfillment process and save on shipping and handling costs by selling in bulk.
Set unique rules for different customers.
Create customized B2B experiences

sections.title: Customer-specific product publishing
sections.content: Offer your business customers curated product selections and catalogs to customize their buying experience.

sections.title: Create custom logic for B2B
sections.content: Input company, location, and contact information into payment and delivery functions to customize your checkout. Meet the needs of both your B2B and DTC customers with logic that works for your B2B workflows, using Shopify Functions.

sections.title: Metafields for companies and locations
sections.content: Track unique information about your customers and streamline back office tasks by adding custom data fields to companies and company locations.

sections.title: Consistent checkout branding
sections.content: Build brand loyalty and awareness by keeping branding and design consistent across your entire B2B checkout experience.

sections.title: Personalize templates using Liquid
sections.content: Delight your logged-in customers with a personalized store theme and email templates that include company information.

sections.title: Easy reordering
sections.content: Encourage reordering and increase sales by making it easy for customers to reorder their favorite products.

sections.title: B2B invitation emails
sections.content: Send customers a customizable welcome email with access and order instructions directly from your admin.

sections.title: Checkout to draft
sections.content:
Streamline the order process for you and your business customers.
Gain greater control and visibility by receiving orders as a draft, allowing you to review and approve them before finalizing.
Increase efficiency by automatically approving customer orders.
Give your customers the opportunity to request a quote online.
relatedLinks: [Find out how Brooklinen uses B2B on Shopify](https://www.shopify.com/plus/customers/brooklinen?utm_source=banner&utm_medium=plus-website&utm_campaign=editions_winter23&utm_content=plus-en-brooklinenb2bcasestudy)

sections.title: Vaulted credit cards
sections.content: Streamline your payment processes and increase on-time payments by letting customers securely store credit cards at checkout or within customer accounts.

sections.title: Payment reminders
sections.content: Create standard payment reminders, or set up a custom workflow using Shopify Flow, to email customers as payments become due or overdue.

sections.title: Invoices for draft orders
sections.content: Create draft orders on behalf of your customers, then easily collect payment by sending invoices directly from the admin.

sections.title: Due-on-fulfillment payment terms
sections.content: Let customers know that payment is due after you’ve fulfilled their order, either by default or for one-off orders.

sections.title: New B2B APIs and compatible apps
sections.content: Use our suite of B2B APIs to create the custom solutions your wholesale business needs like collecting order notes, packaging and delivery instructions at checkout, or even building B2B loyalty programs. Or customize your experience with B2B-compatible apps.

sections.title: Leverage creator partnerships with Shopify Collabs
sections.content: Build authentic relationships using our creator platform to drive sales. Recruit creators using a branded application page or search for the right fit for your community in our creator database. Manage relationships, send gifts, and track affiliate offers—all in one place.

sections.title: Acquire new customers with Shop Cash campaigns
sections.content: Grow your business sustainably with a pay-per-sale acquisition program that lets you boost the Shop Cash customers earn on Shop Pay purchases. Exclusive to Shopify Plus.

sections.title: Audiences extends to the Google network and Pinterest
sections.content: Shopify Audiences helps you find high-intent buyers and increases the likelihood of conversions. Now you can automatically create, export, and refresh store-specific audiences to use across the Google Ad network and Pinterest in addition to the Facebook channel.

sections.title: Performance Max by Google
sections.content: Maximize your reach and drive sales across Google channels like search, YouTube, and the web by running Performance Max campaigns.
relatedLinks: [Try Performance Max by Google in your store](https://admin.shopify.com/apps/google?utm_source=editions&utm_feature=performance-max-app)

sections.title: Advertise with Roku
sections.content: Easily build, buy, and measure TV streaming advertising campaigns directly on the Roku streaming platform.

sections.title: Capture emails with Shopify Forms
sections.content: Collect information from high-intent shoppers with customizable capture forms, including forms that let buyers sign in with Shop. Then market to your list with discounts, automations, and more.

sections.title: Secure authentication with passkeys
sections.content: Offer customers an easier and more secure way to access authenticated shopping experiences. Passkeys are integrated with customers’ Shop accounts and work across the Shop app, Shop Pay, and checkout.

sections.title: Marketing automations for re-engagement
sections.content: Set up marketing automations to email customers who abandon a cart or checkout, or who browse products without buying. Easily add these new automations to your existing workflows in Shopify Email.

sections.title: Customize Shopify Email templates
sections.content: Add a custom Liquid section to any Shopify Email template to create custom fonts, images, buttons, and more.

sections.title: Express checkout buttons in Shopify Email
sections.content: Encourage more sales from your customers’ inbox by including a Shop Pay checkout button in any email campaign.

sections.title: Shopify Inbox now on Shop and Instagram
sections.content: Use chat across Shop and Instagram to share products and close sales with customers. In addition, you can now view live shopping activity in real time from your online store, so you can turn more conversations into sales.

sections.title: Segment customers with new filters
sections.content: Discover powerful insights about your customers by creating segments based on who received or opened an email, purchased a specific product, and more. Then reach out with personalized campaigns to drive sales.

sections.title: Merge duplicate customer profiles
sections.content: Combine duplicate customer profiles to ensure you have the most accurate view of your buyers without losing important historical data.
relatedLinks: [Try merging duplicate customer profiles in your store](https://admin.shopify.com/customers?utm_source=editions&utm_feature=duplicate-customer-profiles)

sections.title: Let shoppers manage orders and returns with new customer accounts
sections.content: Give your customers the power to review orders and manage returns with a customer account that doesn’t make them memorize another password. Customers will soon be able to use passkeys to sign in with their Shop credentials.

sections.title: Create tokengated experiences
sections.content: Distribute your own unique NFTs, then create exclusive perks and experiences that recognize and reward your loyal token holders.
relatedLinks: [Learn how to distribute your own unique NFTs](https://apps.shopify.com/categories/selling-products-blockchain-nft-distribution)

sections.title: Understand buyer behavior with pixels
sections.content: Power your marketing and analytics with secure and accurate customer behavior data that respects their privacy, and manage it all from your admin.

sections.title: More powerful marketing insights
sections.content: Make your marketing dollars go further with insights from new marketing KPIs, channel performance reports, and attribution data that’s automatically collected from UTMs and other signals—now all available in Shopify.

sections.title: Data-sharing with ad platforms
sections.content: Improve your return on ad spend with a wider range of high-quality customer data shared between Shopify and partners like Pinterest and Meta.

sections.title: Logistics that drive conversion
sections.content:
Drive sales by up to 25% with faster delivery and pre-approved access to Shop Promise. Build trust by automatically presenting reliable delivery dates on your storefront, powered by our intelligent software and physical network.
Get prioritized placement, storage, and delivery in our network of 20+ distribution hubs and fulfillment centers with zero capital investment needed.
Businesses of all sizes can access any logistics service, on demand, exactly when and where they need it.

sections.title: Freight and inventory inbounding
sections.content: Move a single pallet or an entire container through ports and within our network of fulfillment centers, powered by Flexport and our nationwide freight services.

sections.title: Data-driven inventory distribution
sections.content: Be ready for spikes in customer demand and sales, and maintain fast delivery through our network that perfectly positions products closest to buyers. Ramp up or down and shift business between DTC and B2B.

sections.title: Configurable logistics
sections.content: Choose from services like freight, fulfillment, storage, prep, and returns. Pay for what you use and change your usage as your business evolves.

sections.title: Advanced returns functionality
sections.content: Streamline returns with three-day processing, product repackaging, and photos for damaged items. Now you can offer instant exchanges and credits through our Loop Returns integration.

sections.title: Smart order routing
sections.content: Whether you’re managing your own locations or partially outsourcing fulfillment, now you can reduce shipping costs and ship faster by routing orders to the most optimal location. Prioritize certain locations over others or those within the customer’s country to avoid duties and customs fees.
relatedLinks: [Sign up for Smart order routing early access](https://www.shopify.com/order-routing-early-access)

sections.title: Enhanced inventory tracking
sections.content: In addition to available, incoming, and committed inventory states, now get a real-time, accurate view of on hand and unavailable quantities across your locations within Shopify to minimize lost sales, misplaced stock, and over-ordering.

sections.title: Improved inventory accuracy across platforms
sections.content: Access the new Inventory States API to sync your on hand and unavailable quantities within Shopify and across external platforms and locations.

sections.title: Bulk fulfillment actions and automations
sections.content: Speed up your fulfillment process with enhanced bulk actions and Shopify Flow’s fulfillment automations. Now you can eliminate repetitive tasks when preparing your orders for shipment and prioritize fulfillment by delivery destination.

sections.title: Customer self-serve returns
sections.content: Let customers request and manage returns—and in the future, exchanges—directly from your online store using their customer account. Improve the customer experience and build loyalty with easier returns.

sections.title: New APIs for returns management
sections.content: Developers can provide businesses better data continuity across systems and returns apps, giving them greater visibility and control over their returns.

sections.title: Shipping insurance is included
sections.content: Protect your shipments from damage, loss, and even porch pirates. Shipping insurance of up to $200 is now included with each eligible label—at no cost to you.

sections.title: Exclusive rates with Shopify Shipping
sections.content: Save on shipping with exclusive rate discounts for USPS, Canada Post, DPD, and DHL Express.

sections.title: Shipping improvements in Canada
sections.content: Businesses using Canada Post can now access improved rates with Shopify Shipping or choose to offer their own rates at checkout. Businesses who want even more options can now work directly with UPS Canada.
relatedLinks: [Try the improved shipping rates calculator in your store](https://admin.shopify.com/shopify-shipping/calculator?utm_source=editions&utm_feature=shipping-exclusive-rates-canada)

sections.title: Shopify Shipping expands to Italy and Spain
sections.content: Now Italian and Spanish businesses can easily ship domestic orders with Poste Italiane in Italy and with Correos in Spain.

sections.title: Granular permissions
sections.content: Introducing 10 new granular permissions, including view-only permissions, so store owners have better control over staff access to products and can delegate more confidently. Additionally on Shopify Plus, businesses can now duplicate an existing role and assign it from their organization admin.

sections.title: Event webhooks
sections.content: The audit events webhook lets you easily access Admin API activity logs on your store, send them to GCP or AWS, and then route the data to your provider of choice without having to contact Shopify IT for a manual pull. Exclusive to Shopify Plus.

sections.title: Metafields enhancements for back office
sections.content: Now you can use the bulk editor to create, edit, and delete values of metafields with definitions on products.

sections.title: Scheduling with Shopify Flow
sections.content: Schedule an automation of nearly any task or process for a specific time of day, week, or month to do more with the apps you’re already using, and fetch data to simplify reporting—all without touching a single line of code.

sections.title: Shopify Flow OpenAI connector
sections.content: With a new branded OpenAI action, now you can use Shopify Flow to send text prompts and configuration parameters to GPT, and get back AI-generated text. Streamline messaging and content in your workflows.

sections.title: Consolidated admin domains
sections.content: Access your store(s) through a single point of entry via admin.shopify.com, and navigate the admin faster with reduced page load times.

sections.title: Shopify Alerts
sections.content: Never miss critical business notifications with the new alerts feed located directly in the admin. Only staff with the required permissions to perform the tasks will receive relevant alerts. So those who need to know are notified about important updates, and others can continue working as usual.

sections.title: New index page design
sections.content: We’ve improved the quality of the index page experience in the admin by reducing layers and consolidating the interface, creating a consistent system that works across all index pages.

sections.title: ShopifyQL Notebooks
sections.content:
Make better business decisions by exploring and analyzing your data, visualizing your growth, and creating custom reports—all powered by our intelligent query language that understands commerce. Write your data story with ShopifyQL Notebooks. Exclusive to Shopify Plus.
Explore new datasets with a better editor experience and assistive functionality with smart defaults.
Use presentation mode to share your data story.
Developers can now build apps or custom solutions for businesses with access to the ShopifyQL Stable API.

sections.title: Improved reporting for better insights
sections.content: Discover your most loyal customers with the new cohort analysis, which helps you identify key drivers for improving customer retention over time. Find the answers you’re looking for faster with the new reports index, and use comparisons to analyze performance over previous time periods.

sections.title: Shopify Tax
sections.content:
Sales tax in the United States is complicated. Shopify Tax handles the complexity for you.
Stay on top of tax obligations with a state-by-state overview, and automatically apply the right rates at the right time, even as local rules and rates change.
Take control of your sales tax collection, and get insights about it from your Shopify admin.

sections.title: Shopify Balance app
sections.content: Now you can manage your business finances easily and securely while on the go with the Shopify Balance app. Then close your books even faster with accounting integrations like Freshbooks, Bench, Sage, and more.

sections.title: Shopify Capital extends to Australia
sections.content: Eligible Australians can now access funding without waiting in line at a bank, giving up equity, or doing tedious paperwork.

sections.title: Shopify mobile app improvements
sections.content:
Set up, grow, and run a world-class commerce business from your phone.
Easily edit and update the look of your store with the online store editor. Take product images with your phone, and follow an intuitive flow to create new products and set up variants.
Automate your marketing and create branded emails using a variety of templates, or build custom emails on the go with Shopify Email.
Quickly and accurately update inventory, and get an at-a-glance view of your store’s performance.

sections.title: Redesigned Shopify App Store
sections.content:
It’s easier than ever to choose the right apps to extend your store and confidently achieve your business goals.
Find exactly what you’re looking for with personalized recommendations, related searches, and easy-to-scan app listings.
Learn how to solve every business challenge with new navigation and app categories that offer more education.
Find out what other businesses are using to get inspired, and discover new high-quality apps that can help your business grow.
relatedLinks: [Find out what apps other businesses are using](https://apps.shopify.com/stories/merchant-tech-stack-thousand)

sections.title: Hydrogen 2: built on Remix
sections.content:
Build performant, dynamic, and unique storefronts faster with Hydrogen and Remix.
Hydrogen features a new Storefront API client to make querying simple, starter templates and an upgraded CLI to get building faster, and Remix-optimized components.
Leverage the open-source Remix framework and the power of the edge for improved performance with advancements like optimistic UI, nested routing, and progressive enhancement.
Catch errors with improved TypeScript and IntelliSense support, ESLint support, and improved resilience across the framework.

sections.title: Oxygen hosting available to more plans
sections.content: Get optimized performance and deploy Hydrogen-based storefronts globally with one click—for no extra cost—on our built-in hosting platform. Available to all plans except Starter.

sections.title: Use Hydrogen with more React frameworks
sections.content: Bring some of the best parts of Hydrogen to more React frameworks like Next.js and Gatsby. The Hydrogen React library includes components like cart and Shop Pay and, for the first time to custom storefronts, Shopify Analytics.

sections.title: Lightning-fast Storefront API
sections.content: Now the Storefront API is rendered globally to the edge, enabling fast load speeds on every device. It also supports private authentication for building server-side applications without limits.

sections.title: Easy storefront prototyping with sample data
sections.content: Quickly spin up a proof-of-concept storefront without having to set up a shop or run any server-side code. Use our simple API to query sample products, variants, carts, and more to instantly experience headless commerce on Shopify.

sections.title: Easy storefront prototyping with sample data
sections.content: Quickly spin up a proof-of-concept storefront without having to set up a shop or run any server-side code. Use our simple API to query sample products, variants, carts, and more to instantly experience headless commerce on Shopify.

sections.title: Globally deployed Shopify Cart
sections.content:
Built on the same infrastructure as our storefronts, Shopify Cart is deployed globally to the edge for faster response times.
Rolling out in phases, carts are interoperable across your storefronts, so you can run a shared cart across experiences like mobile and web.
Use metafields to extend the cart schema with custom values that power unique logic on checkout or trigger a checkout extension.

sections.title: Build for millions of buyers with Shop Minis
sections.content: Build and integrate your experiences directly into the Shop app with our React Native SDK. Get started with just one command, and use pre-built components like search, product pages, and cart to make an incredible mobile shopping experience.
relatedLinks: [Access the early release of Shop Minis](https://shop.app/minis)

sections.title: Extend your checkout
sections.content: With Shopify Functions and checkout UI extensions, you can customize Shopify’s backend to alter the look, feel, and behavior of your checkout experience. Build the product bundles, order routing logic, checkout and cart validation rules, or delivery and payment options you need.

sections.title: Introducing JavaScript for Shopify Functions
sections.content: Functions can now be written in JavaScript in addition to any other language that can compile to WebAssembly.
relatedLinks: [Try the developer preview of JavaScript Shopify Functions](https://shopify.dev/api/functions/language-support/javascript)

sections.title: New APIs for checkout UI extensions
sections.content: Checkout UI extensions now support authenticated network calls, direct querying of the Storefront API, and applying discount codes and gift cards using new APIs.

sections.title: Build apps for the checkout editor
sections.content: Create apps that let Shopify Plus businesses add product offers, custom fields, loyalty programs, and more to their checkout. Businesses can configure this custom content directly in the drag-and-drop checkout editor.

sections.title: UI extensions are now available for the order status page
sections.content: Build apps that extend the functionality of the order status page. Add referral codes, product reviews, and more after a purchase. Extensions are upgrade-safe and can be configured by businesses without touching a line of code.

sections.title: Create custom data models with metaobjects
sections.content: Powered by metafields, use metaobjects to create custom content like product highlights and extend your back office data with custom objects like product materials. When building apps, control who can access your metafields and metaobjects through a reserved namespace.

sections.title: Build with Shopify Blockchain
sections.content: Use robust APIs and UI components to develop your next token-powered experience. Build apps that target specific audiences, drive engagement with exclusive perks, fuel customer loyalty, and foster brand collabs.

sections.title: Increased API rate limits
sections.content: As businesses grow, they need to scale their tech stack. We’re providing unthrottled API calls for our newly launched Commerce Components by Shopify and increasing standard Admin API rate limits by 10x for Shopify Plus.

sections.title: Shopify CLI improvements
sections.content: Shopify CLI 3 can now integrate into your CI/CD pipeline to perform actions like pushing, pulling, and publishing a theme. When writing Liquid code, the updated CLI suggests context-aware autocompletion and in-line documentation. Also, when building apps, you have flexibility to bring your own tunnel.

sections.title: Simplify webhook testing via CLI
sections.content: Easily trigger delivery of a sample payload for any Admin API webhook event topic with a single CLI command. Experiment with webhooks, test your endpoints, and verify that your app uses the payload as expected.

sections.title: Customer data protection by default
sections.content: Protect personal customer data with default redacting in APIs and the ability to apply for necessary access throughout the life of your app.

sections.title: Robust test data for development stores
sections.content: Now you can populate your store with test data in a single click, so you can start developing your app or theme faster. This data includes the most common commerce resources and configurations to make testing and debugging easier.

sections.title: Make your app shine
sections.content:
The Built for Shopify program offers great visibility and growth for apps that meet the high-quality standards Shopify has for commerce experiences. Get guidance on building great apps and improved performance reporting, then apply to join the program for special treatment in the Shopify App Store.
Get your app in front of the right brands with self-categorization and a redesigned app listing that’s optimized to convert.
Easily access key information about your apps, including revenue, API health, and progress toward earning app highlights in the improved app overview page in the Partner Dashboard.
relatedLinks: [Learn more about the Built for Shopify program](https://shopify.dev/built-for-shopify)

sections.title: Introducing Commerce Components
sections.content: Commerce Components by Shopify gives you the choice to build and integrate your commerce stack, your way. Choose from modular components, integrate them with your existing services, and create commerce experiences that convert.

sections.title: Globally scaled infrastructure
sections.content: Build faster on the most widely scaled commerce infrastructure, and get an edge-deployed cart that seamlessly integrates with your existing sites.

sections.title: Build with choice
sections.content: Choose from more than 30 components, including the world’s best-converting checkout, and use flexible APIs with no rate limits to create unparalleled customer experiences.

sections.title: World-class ecosystem
